text:
Memo from the desk of
Anne Taylor
September 11, 1962
Dear Miss Corwell:
This is to confirm the time set aside for the
meeting of the Public Relations Committee during
the Philadelphia Convention, I will be happy
to reserve a room for this meeting for 7 p.m.,
Sunday, October 21,
I am not able at this time to give you the room
number. However, it will be listed in the final
Convention Program and you might tell your Committee
members to check there for the place of the meeting.
Anne Taylor
Convention Secretary
